EPRTRAnnexIMainActivityLabel: Chemical\ installations\ for\ the\ production\ on\ an\ industrial\ scale\ of\ basic\ inorganic\ chemicals.\ Note\ to\ reporters,\ use\ Level\ 3\ activity\ e.g.\ 4(b)(i),\ in\ preference\ to\ 4(b).\ Level\ 2\ activity\ class\ (i.e.\ 4(b))\ only\ to\ be\ used\ where\ Level\ 3\ is\ not\ available.
